relevance_explanation: The trimmed routine contains only logic relevant to the customer. The suspended account logic, zero balance logic, and late fee waiver logic were all correctly removed because the customer has an active account, a balance, and is not eligible for a waiver.
completeness_explanation: All necessary logic, tools and branches that apply to this customer have been preserved. All removed steps were either irrelevant or the information was already inlined in the trimmed routine.
